pages.text: The Igneous Extruder is a device that will generate infinite stone when surrounded with the appropriate blocks and fluids. For example, placing water and lava next to it will allow it to produce cobblestone. Placing lava and blue ice next to it with soul soil underneath will generate basalt.

pages.title: Igneous Extruder
pages.text: At first, it will produce 1 block per second, but this can be augmented up to 4/sec using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)integral components$(/l).
